summary: A test suite that validates the core functionality of a hybrid encoder‑decoder speech recognition model combining RNNT and CTC with byte‑pair encoding, covering construction, decoding configuration, forward computation, artifact persistence, and vocabulary updates.
business_intent: Guarantee that the hybrid RNNT/CTC BPE model operates correctly and can be reliably saved, restored, and adapted, supporting robust deployment in speech‑to‑text applications.
